name: Fit-Rex
0:
”Alexa, ask fit rex to get my totals for yesterday.”
”Alexa, ask fit rex to get my latest activity.”
”Alexa, ask fit rex to set my weight to 150 pounds.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fit rex
des:
Fit-Rex is a utility for Google Fit users. To start using this skill enable Fit-Rex and link it to your google account.

Then you can say "Alexa, ask Fit Rex to..."
- get my totals for today
- get my latest activity
- set my weight to 175 pounds
- get my weight
- create a reminder next Thursday at 4 P.M.

Fit -Rex will only give you fitness totals that have already been synchronized from your device to the Google Fit cloud. Fit-Rex does not store or collect any personal information. Fit-Rex is not affiliated with Google in any way. 

Please check Fit-Rex often for new skill enhancements and bug fixes. Email me at ggparkerdev@gmail.com if you need help or have enhancement requests.
